articles.title: How the gamma-ray burst of the century surprised spacecraft operators - Space.com
articles.description: Europe's galaxy mapper Gaia sent a strange signal that ground controllers first couldn't explain.
articles.content:
A fleet of space telescopes unexpectedly detected the record-breaking gamma-ray burst GRB221009A onOct.9, sparking concern among spacecraft operators about the blast's odd signal.
